text: Sridhar Ramaswamy, born in 1967, was the Senior Vice President of Ads & Commerce at Google, and is now a Partner at Greylock Partners. He joined Google in 2003. He previously worked at E.piphany and Lucent Technologies, Bell Communications Research, and Bell Labs. He graduated from IIT Madras and has a Ph.D. from Brown University.
